name: RetroCat
description: RetroCat is a charming oscilloscope-themed robot with a love for all things vintage. Equipped with soldier buttons and arms, as well as soldier legs, this robot stands tall and ready for action. Its screen displays an adorable cat, adding a touch of playfulness to its retro aesthetic. To enhance its visual capabilities, RetroCat even sports a stylish pair of glasses. Being a member of the WebtrES club, RetroCat is always ready to explore the depths of the digital world.
